short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: beerSnob will help you to quickly discard all the lesser beers when you searching for your next bottle of liquid courage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: beerSnob will help you quickly discard all the lesser beers on your quest for the ultimate thirst quencher. Hook up your Untappd-account and you will be able to get a brews Untappd-rating straight from the source of truth itself whilst you are browsing your preferred merchant of liquid courage.
